nodes.text: Osaji Varane was a male Human who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Varane worked for the Osaji Syndicate, a criminal organization that was ran by his father, Osaji Shimka. Following Shimka's death, control of the syndicate passed to Varane and his two siblings, Osaji Hux and Osaji Uhares. Varane established a career for himself on the planet Tirahnn, working as a trader, and he was assassinated on the world by a group of agents that had been hired by Osaji Hux.
